trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGME108_04939_SEQ_00<tab>Wuk Lamat is eager to follow Gulool Ja into the ruined town.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_TODO_01<tab>Survey the designated location.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_TODO_02<tab>Follow Gulool Ja without being seen.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Otis.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_TODO_04<tab>Survey the designated area and slay a young woolback for its meat.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the woolback loin to Otis.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>I only saw him for a moment before he disappeared behind a building, but I'm pretty sure Gulool Ja was heading further south.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_WUKLAMAT_000_002<tab>I'll contact Alisaie on linkpearl and let her know to join us.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_WUKLAMAT_000_003<tab>This is the area, but the canals and the debris make it hard to get a good view...
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_WUKLAMAT_000_004<tab>Let's split up and search. If you could head into the canals, I'll make my way through the streets.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_WUKLAMAT_100_004<tab>When we find Gulool Ja, let's watch from a distance until he gets to his destination. Wouldn't want to startle him and cause an accident.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_WUKLAMAT_000_005<tab>Alisaie is coming as fast as she can. Let's keep searching in the meantime.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You have located Gulool Ja. Follow him quietly without being noticed.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>Follow Gulool Ja from a safe distance. The objective will end in failure if you are noticed, or if you fall too far behind.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Should you fail to complete the objective, you may try again by surveying the designated location.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>Attempt to follow Gulool Ja?
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab>He spoke to us! Gulool Ja actually spoke to us!
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>If Otis has been around for as long as he claims, perhaps he knows things that not even Oblivion is aware of.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_GULOOLJA_000_030<tab>Otis cooks the best food.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_OTIS_000_040<tab>So, my new friends! I would enlist your aid in procuring the ingredients for our repast.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_OTIS_000_041<tab>After all, the most enjoyable meals are those we make together!
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_WUKLAMAT_000_042<tab>We're happy to pitch in, of course. What ingredients did you have in mind?
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_OTIS_000_043<tab>First of all, some yam and pumpkin. The people of the outskirts should be willing to share their harvest, if you and Gulool Ja could go and speak to them.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_GULOOLJA_000_044<tab>Sure. I'll ask for the castoffs too, as usual.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_OTIS_000_045<tab>As for <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and Alisaie, I would be obliged if you could procure some woolback meat.

TEXT_KINGME108_04939_OTIS_000_046<tab>The creatures can be found grazing on the slopes outside of town. As beef is less readily available, their flesh makes for a good substitute─that of the younger ones especially, as it is more tender and less gamy.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_ALISAIE_000_047<tab>Consider it done. We'll be back with the meat before you know it!
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_OTIS_000_048<tab>Thank you kindly! In the meantime, I shall see to other preparations.
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_OTIS_000_050<tab>Hahaha! There is nothing so fine as a meal with friends old and new!
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_ALISAIE_000_055<tab>Say, why don't we make a contest out of it? Whoever delivers the meat first is the winner!
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>You haven't finished yet, right? That would be too fast, even for you!
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_OTIS_000_070<tab>What's this? Am I to understand that you have already procured the meat?
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_OTIS_000_071<tab>Good heavens, you have─and such a choice cut it is besides!
TEXT_KINGME108_04939_OTIS_000_072<tab>'Tis plain you know how to handle yourself in battle. Were it four hundred years ago, I would have recruited you to the royal knights. Hahaha!
